channel.title: Homes on Lachlan Deer
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Lachlan Deer

item.description: Biography I am a PhD Candidate at the Department of Economics at the University of Zurich. My research interests lie in empirical industrial organization and quantitative marketing. You can find a pdf version of my CV here.

item.title: Teaching
item.description: Current @ UZH Programming Practices for Research in Economics, 2nd year PhD Course. Co-taught with Adrian Etter, Julian Langer, Max Winkler 2017 Edition: Course Home Page, Course Material & Installation Guide 2016 Edition: Syllabus Previous Teaching @ UZH Cross Section & Panel Data Econometrics, 2nd year Masters level, 2014-15 & 2015-16 Empirical Analysis of Asymmetric Information in Banking and Insurance Markets, 2014-2015 Software Carpentry & Data Carpentry I am an instructor for Software Carpentry and Data Carpenty, who offer short courses on programming and reproducible research practices in professional and academic settings.
